name: Boole and the Boulders
description:
This is the end of the world. Boulders are falling from the sky and Boole the frog wants to live.

Move Boole with the arrow keys. Avoid the falling boulders.

Share your highest score in the comments!

Submission for the Legacy Mob Game Jam #28

Made by remiscan (code, design) & skando (design, art, sound).

Font: C&C Red Alert (https://www.dafont.com/c-c-red-alert-inet.font)

ََDownload Assets : https://skando.itch.io/boole-and-the-boulders-assets
